data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 21,217 believers in Raichur against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Raichur, Karnataka, India

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Raichur, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 1,884,180 lost people in  Raichur, Karnataka, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Raichur, Karnataka, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Bedar Bile people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, strengthen the church in Raichur, Karnataka, India by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Raichur, Karnataka, India a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who are far from you in Raichur. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

location.name: Raichur
location.people_groups_list: Bedar Naik Makkalu, Bedar Kakamundi, Bedar Myasa, Sillekyatha, Budega Jangam
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Bedar Naik Makkalu (109,000), Bedar Kakamundi (99,000), Bedar Myasa (60,000), Sillekyatha (36,000), Budega Jangam (305,000)
